# Contributing to MCP Checkpoint

Thank you for your interest in contributing! We welcome all kinds of contributions—code, documentation, ideas, and more.

## Code of Conduct
By participating, you agree to abide by our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). Please review it to understand expected behavior.

## How You Can Help
- Report bugs  
- Suggest new features  
- Improve documentation  
- Fix issues marked as “Good first issue”  
- Review pull requests

## Getting Started
1. Fork the repository and clone your fork:  
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/your-username/mcp-checkpoint.git
